price: 67.Kaadu koroosite mari nee kee ni- abbobti rabneeh burta nekkeek gamadal, diggah nanu magooqak nuwwuk awqennoo iyyen?
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا تُرَٰبٗا وَءَابَآؤُنَآ أَئِنَّا لَمُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhīna kafarū a-idhā kunnā turāban waābāunā a-innā lamukh'rajūna
